byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Yamiche Alcindor, Sabrina Tavernise, Katie Rogers, Matthew Rosenberg, Jodi Kantor and Scott Shane from Washington; Adeshina Emmanuel from Chicago; Annie Correal from New York; Jennifer Medina from Los Angeles; Courtney Sherwood from Portland, Ore.; Fernanda Santos from Phoenix; Thomas Fuller from San Francisco; and Campbell Robertson from New Orleans.
byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT, NICK CORASANITI and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

lead_paragraph: A resistance has descended on the capital as Donald J. Trump takes office, prompting officers, some in riot gear, to employ crowd-dispersing sprays.
snippet: A resistance has descended on the capital as Donald J. Trump takes office, prompting officers, some in riot gear, to employ crowd-dispersing sprays....

headline.main: Inauguration Protesters and Police Clash on Washington’s Streets
headline.print_headline: Anti-Trump Protests, Peaceful and Violent, Erupt Across the U.S.
